input.sentences: our house is the larger brick house | next to the white house .
the area where we live is near a lake .
this is the fence that acts as a guardrail | near our house .
the shallow mountains are located to the other side of the lake .
this is picture of my car | parked near our house | overlooking the lake .
output.sentences: Our new white house was dwarfed by the larger building beside it.
The quaint town we now live in sits beside a lake.
Near our house we have a fence that also acts as the road's gaurdrail.
We have a great view of the mountains located near the shallow lake.
Often we see people parked in a spot overlooking the town, hoping to get a good picture.
